document.heading: Pre-litigation Discovery of Insurance Coverage Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-281, the “Pre-litigation Discovery of Insurance Coverage Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-890. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012 and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 25, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-646 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-281 became effective on April 23, 2013.
